definition: to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct

sentences.english: Ming Leizhou people think of its function, the construction of "Yang Gong Corner" of worship.

sentences.english: These houses were put up in 1924.
The Construction of Chongqing-Huaihua Railway will exert a tremendous influence on the economic development of the area along the railway.
sentences.chinese: 渝懷鐵路修建對沿線地區經濟發展具有重要意義。

sentences.english: Symmetrically on both sides of the layout, built auxiliary building.
sentences.chinese: 兩側呈對稱佈局，建有匡助修建。

sentences.english: The accident took place at a power plant in Fengcheng where a cooling tower was under construction.
sentences.chinese: 事故發生在江西豐城一處電廠，正在修建一座冷卻塔。

sentences.english: Villagers built Ruiyuan themselves to improve their children's opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 村民們修建了瑞元小學，以期改善子女的教育境況。

sentences.english: They built the Great Wall to protect the country from being attacked.
sentences.chinese: 他們修建了長城，以保護國家免受攻擊。

sentences.english: The people of Linxian Country really did wonders in building the canal.
sentences.chinese: 林縣人民修建這條水渠，的確創造了奇蹟。

sentences.english: The citys octagonal layout was modeled on the eight-diagram pattern.
sentences.chinese: 這座城市就是按照八卦的圖形修建的。

sentences.english: Tsarist Russia in 1898, when the railway construction in the Middle East, in this set up Sarthou station.
sentences.chinese: 年沙俄修建中東鐵路時，在此建立了薩爾圖站。

sentences.english: He took a job as a carpenter with the task of building a recording studio.
sentences.chinese: 於是他承接了修建一個錄音棚的木匠活。

sentences.english: Officials in Ming and Qing Dynasties were often sent to Qingshuijiang-Miao territory to collect timbers for royal palaces.
sentences.chinese: 明清兩朝爲修建皇宮到清水江“苗疆”徵辦“皇木”。

sentences.english: China is building not only high speed trains but planes.
sentences.chinese: 中國不僅在建設高鐵，還在修建飛機。

sentences.english: Approval of construction of the heliport to go through and above the provincial level government, and military.
sentences.chinese: 修建直升機場的審批要經過省級以上政府，以及軍方。

sentences.english: Arch bridge can be constructed over a falsework , or temporary scaffolding.
sentences.chinese: 曲拱橋樑可以被修建在腳手架或者臨時腳手架。

sentences.english: They assigned the bridge to the 15th Century A. D.
sentences.chinese: 他們確定這座橋是15世紀時修建的。

definition: to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
to carry out large scale construction
to extend (a building, an airport runway etc)
to repair/to refurbish/to renovate/to refit/to mend/to rebuild
to cut (a canal, tunnel, well etc)
